Translations.Text: navu avarige torisida pratiyondu puraveyu tanaginta modalu banda puraveginta doddadagittu mattu avaru (satyadedege) maralabahudendu navu avarannu siksege olapadisidevu
avaru helidaru; ‘‘o jadugarane, ninage nidalagiruva vagdanada anusthanakkagi ninu namagagi ninna odeyanodane prarthisu. Navu khandita sanmargadalli nadeyuvevu’’
konege navu avara melinda sikseyannu nivarisidaga avaru vacana bhanga madidaru
phir‌aunanu tanna janangakkondu kare nididanu. Avanu helidanu; nanna janangadavare, ijipt‌na adhipatya nanage seriddallave? Mattu i nadigalu nanage adhinavagi hariyuttiveyallave? Nivenu noduttillave
kilu vargada hagu spastavagi matanadalagada a vyaktiginta (musariginta) nanu sresthanallave
(atanu nijakku deva dutanagiddare) avanige cinnada balegalanneke nidalagilla? Athava avana jote salugattiruva malak‌galeke bandilla
hige avanu tanna janangadavarannu manisidanu mattu avaru atanannu anusarisidaru. Avaru khandita ondu avidheya janangavagiddaru
konege avaru nam'mannu udrekisidaga navu avarellarannu mulugisi bittevu
Mattu navu avarannu gatakaladavaragi hagu mundinavara palige ondu kateyagi marpadisi bittevu
(dutare,) maryamara putra (isa)ra udaharaneyannu mundittaga nim'ma janangadavaru nakku biduttare
nam'ma devarugalu uttamaro athava atano? Endavaru keluttare. Avaru nim'ma munde adannu prastapisuvudu kevala jagaladuvudakke matra. Nijavagi avaru ondu jagalaganta janangavagiddare
